68 Clinical Descriptions and Diagnostic Requirements for ICD-11 Mental, Behavioural or Neurodevelopmental Disorders
6C48.3 Caffeine withdrawal
6C48.71 Caffeine-induced anxiety disorder

6C49 Disorders due to use of hallucinogens

6C49.10 … episodic
6C49.11 … continuous
6C49.1Z … unspecified
6C49.2 Hallucinogen dependence
Specify pattern of substance use or remission:

6C49.21 … early full remission
6C49.22 … sustained partial remission
6C49.23 … sustained full remission
6C49.2Z … unspecified
6C49.3 Hallucinogen intoxication

6C49.5 Hallucinogen-induced psychotic disorder
6C49.60 Hallucinogen-induced mood disorder
Specify clinical presentation:
6C49.600 … with depressive symptoms
6C49.601 … with manic symptoms
6C49.602 … with mixed depressive and manic symptoms
6C49.60Z … unspecified
